page.title: 13A Gt.Bromley Saturday #2
page.content: Sam is our black & white{Springer {Spaniel.}We take him about 2 miles & go home for tea.Tea is steak,egg & chips, bread & butter,and ice-cream. Then I watch T.V. again.My favourite programmes are space adventures & war films.I eat{crisps}& chocolate & drink lemonade or {shandy}while I watch T.V. About 8:30,I have a bath & hair-wash, put on my pyjamas and go to bed. { Glossary for pages 12 & 13.} {Breakfast T.V}6:00-9:30a.m.began 1982. {Marmite.}=yeast-based savoury spread. {Lego.}=snap-together construction toy. {Star Wars.}=toys based on space films. {B.M.X.bike.}=lightweight stunt bike for"wheelies" (balancing on the rear wheel)=Bicycle Moto-Cross. {Springer Spaniel}=old English breed of gundog now mainly kept as a pet. {Crisps}=thin slices of fried potato. {Shandy}=lemonade & beer mixed.
